text: Qurghan is a district in Faryab Province, Afghanistan. It was created in 2005 from the western part of Andkhoy District. The district center Qurghan is very close to Andkhoy at 317 m altitude. The district covers and has 13 villages. As of 2003, the population is 27,116. ==Notes== ==References== * ==External links== * Map of Settlements IMMAP, 2011 Category:Districts of Faryab Province
title: Qurghan District
